TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit VirtualizingPanel extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel
Public MustInherit Class VirtualizingPanel Inherits Panel
public ref class VirtualizingPanel abstract : System::Windows::Controls::Panel

summary.span: 为虚拟化其子数据集合的 元素提供一个框架。

span.span: Provides a framework for elements that virtualize their child data collection.

summary.span: 这是一个抽象类。

span.span: This is an abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在此上下文中，"虚拟化" 指的是一种技术，通过该技术，用户界面 (UI) 元素根据屏幕上可见的项在更多数据项中生成。In this context, "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of user interface (UI) elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on the screen. 如果在指定时刻只有少量 UI 元素位于屏幕上，则此时生成大量 UI 元素需要占用大量内存和处理器。It is intensive, both in terms of memory and processor, to generate a large number of UI elements when only a few may be on the screen at a given time. 继承自的面板（ 如 ）可计算可见项，并通过 (（如或) ）使用 来创建可见项的 UI 元素。A panel that inherits from , such as the , calculates visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to only create UI elements for visible items. 以下列表描述了 无法虚拟化项容器时的情况：The following lists describes cases when the cannot virtualize item containers: - 包含不同类型的项容器。The contains item containers of different types. 例如， 可能有使用 和 对象作为项容器的项。For example, a might have items that use both and objects as the item containers. - 将项容器显式创建到 。You explicitly create the item containers to the . 有关显式和隐式创建项容器的详细信息，请参阅 类。For more information about explicitly versus implicitly creating item containers, see the class. 当 正在虚拟化项容器时，可能需要保存与容器关联的状态信息，而不是与数据项本身相关联的状态信息。When a is virtualizing item containers, you may need to save state information that is associated with a container instead of with the data item itself. 例如，如果某个项包含在 控件中，则该 状态将绑定到项容器，而不是绑定到数据项本身。For example, if an item is contained by an control, the state is bound to the item container, and not to the data item itself. 当对 新项重复使用时，的当前值 将用于新项。When the is reused for a new item, the current value of is used for the new item. 此外，旧项不会保留其 值。In addition, the old item does not retain its value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) 中的派生类。The following example demonstrates how to use the derived class in Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML). [!code-xaml[virtualizingstackpanel_intro#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VirtualizingStackPanel_Intro/CS/default.xaml#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置虚拟化 时，视区前后缓存的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the cache before and after the viewport when the is virtualizing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存是视区（其中的项未虚拟化）上方或下方的空间量。The cache is the amount of space above or below the viewport in which items are not virtualized. 使用缓存来避免在 UI 元素滚动到查看时生成它们。Use a cache to avoid generating UI elements as they're scrolled into view. 属性确定使用的度量单位 。The property determines the unit of measurement that is used by .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此 是否应当虚拟化一个项。

span.span: Get or sets a value that indicates whether this should virtualize an item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 面板和控件对象使用项容器上的此属性来跟踪容器可以和不能进行虚拟化的时间。Panel and Control objects use this property on item containers to track when the container can and cannot be virtualized.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty IsContainerVirtualizableProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly IsContainerVirtualizableProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 标识 附加属性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此 正在虚拟化其子集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates that this is virtualizing its child collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标准布局系统为与列表控件关联的每个项创建项容器并计算布局。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. "虚拟化" 一词是指一种技术，通过该技术，可根据屏幕上可见的项，从更多的数据项生成一小部分 UI 元素。The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of UI elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen. 如果屏幕上只有几个元素，则生成多个 UI 元素可能会对应用程序的性能产生负面影响。Generating many UI elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application. 例如，将 计算可见项的数目，并使用 来自 (（如 或 ) ）来仅为可见项创建 UI 元素。For example, the calculates the number of visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to create UI elements only for visible items. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 XAML 绑定到 XML 数据源并虚拟化元素中显示的项 。The following example shows how to bind to an XML data source and virtualize the items displayed in a element by using XAML. 请注意， 附加属性显式设置为 `true` 。Notice that the attached property is explicitly set to `true`. [!code-xml[VirtualizingStackPanel_Intro#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VirtualizingStackPanel_Intro/CS/default.xaml#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标准布局系统为与列表控件关联的每个项创建项容器并计算布局。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. 在此上下文中，"虚拟化" 指的是一种技术，通过该技术，用户界面 (UI) 元素根据屏幕上可见的项在更多数据项中生成。In this context, "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of user interface (UI) elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on the screen. 如果在指定时刻只有少量 UI 元素位于屏幕上，则此时生成大量 UI 元素需要占用大量内存和处理器。It is intensive, both in terms of memory and processor, to generate a large number of UI elements when only a few may be on the screen at a given time.

summary.span: 获取或设置 中的面板虚拟化其子项的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets how a panel in an virtualizes its child items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，将为 每个可见项创建一个项容器，并在不再需要时将其丢弃 (例如，当项从视图中滚动) 时。By default, a creates an item container for each visible item and discards it when it is no longer needed (such as when the item is scrolled out of view). 当 包含大量项时，创建和放弃项容器的过程会对性能产生负面影响。When an contains a lot of items, the process of creating and discarding item containers can negatively affect performance. 当 设置为时 ，将 重用项容器，而不是每次都创建一个新的。When is set to , the reuses item containers instead of creating a new one each time. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，并将 附加属性设置为 。The following example creates a and sets the attached property to . [!code-xml[RecycleItemContainerShippets#VirtualizationMode](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#virtualizationmode)] 下面的示例显示了上一示例中使用的数据。The following example shows the data used in the previous example. [!code-csharp[RecycleItemContainerShippets#ListBoxData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#listboxdata)] [!code-vb[RecycleItemContainerShippets#ListBoxData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#listboxdata)]
